name: Bright Minds
shortDescription: Expert support for children with dyslexia.
longDescription: Bright Minds offers tailored programs for children with dyslexia, helping them improve literacy skills in a nurturing environment.

name: Focus Forward
longDescription: Focus Forward coaches children with ADHD using personalized approaches to improve attention and reduce behavioral challenges.

name: Learning Lighthouse
shortDescription: Structured learning for children with autism.
longDescription: Learning Lighthouse provides a safe and structured environment to help children with autism spectrum disorders thrive in both academic and social settings.

name: SkillSprout
longDescription: SkillSprout delivers high-quality speech therapy sessions, helping children improve articulation, fluency, and overall communication skills.

name: Mind Bloom
shortDescription: Behavioral support for children with emotional needs.
longDescription: Mind Bloom focuses on managing emotional and behavioral challenges through play therapy, CBT, and family support plans.

name: Thrive Tutors
shortDescription: Customized learning for special education needs.
longDescription: Thrive Tutors creates custom academic plans for children with learning disabilities, using adaptive teaching methods.

name: NeuroNest
longDescription: NeuroNest uses brain-training activities to strengthen focus, memory, and logic skills for children with cognitive delays.

name: Growth Edge
shortDescription: Enhancing motor and daily living skills.
longDescription: Growth Edge supports children in developing fine/gross motor skills and independence through evidence-based occupational therapy.

name: Step Up Services
longDescription: Step Up Services provides early intervention programs designed to help children with developmental delays catch up with their peers.

name: Bright Horizons
longDescription: Bright Horizons helps children navigate emotions and build resilience through therapeutic storytelling and mindfulness practices.
